hero-section.title: Experience the Taste of France
hero-section.subtitle: Elegant atmosphere, refined cuisine and sophisticated style — everything you love about France

open-your-potential.title: Luna Restaurant Group
open-your-potential.subtitle: Since 2016, the Luna restaurant group has been delighting guests with delicious cuisine and quality service. We have cozy cafés, refined restaurants and quick bite venues.

contactsPage.title: Write or call — we will answer all your questions

restaurant.name: LunaRosa Restaurant
restaurant.desc-1: Our French restaurant is a corner of Paris in your city. We offer exquisite cuisine with a focus on fresh ingredients, delicate flavor combinations and classic French recipes. The menu includes tender croissants, cream soups, duck confit, French onion soup, tartare and desserts that have won hearts worldwide.

coffeeshop.name: LunaBello Café
coffeeshop.desc-1: Our café is a cozy place for meetings and inspiration. We offer aromatic coffee from selected beans, prepared using classic and signature recipes. The menu includes fresh pastries, desserts, light snacks and drinks that create the perfect mood for any day.

fast-food.name: LunaBite Fast Food
fast-food.desc-1: Our fast food is quick, tasty and satisfying. We prepare burgers, sandwiches, fries and snacks using only fresh ingredients so that every bite is bright and full of flavor. The menu features classic hits and signature dishes the whole family will enjoy.

healthy-diet.name: LunaVita Healthy Dining
healthy-diet.desc-1: Our healthy dining restaurant offers tasty food without compromising on health. We prepare dishes from natural and fresh ingredients, maintaining a balance of proteins, fats and carbohydrates. The menu includes salads, bowls, healthy desserts and smoothies for those who value taste and care for their body.
